name: Accelerated Spanish Through Community Engaged Learning
description: This course is a combination of SPA100Y1 and SPA220Y1 into one year. It is designed for students with prior knowledge of Spanish, but whose level is not appropriate to enroll in SPA220Y1. The focus is on the fundamentals of Spanish grammar and cultural aspects through community service learning with the local Spanish-speaking community of Toronto. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
prerequisites: High School Spanish; informal knowledge of Spanish
exclusions: Native and Heritage Speakers, SPA219Y1, SPA100Y1 and SPA220Y1
